channel.title: Coding problem... making commands owner only

item.title: Coding problem... making commands owner only
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

ok try if (command.startsWith("kick") && (playerRights >= 3)) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked "+command.substring(5)); System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is kicking "+command.substring(5));; }

Hope this helps

  • toonshorty

item.title: Coding problem... making commands owner only
item.dc:creator: @Slappa4 Slappa4
item.description:
@Slappa4 wrote:

Ok this is the code for kick

if (command.startsWith(“kick”)) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Owner Levi”)))
{
PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
sendMessage("You kicked “+command.substring(5));
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+” is kicking "+command.substring(5));;
}

Why doesn’t the && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Owner Levi”))) make it only for me? mods and admin can still use it

Read full topic
item.source: Coding problem... making commands owner only
